File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines column and row headers across all tabular data files (files ending in ".csv" or ".tsv") in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE FLMD v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: R project file use to improve organization and management of R files.
This file contains information about United States Geological Survey (USGS) sampling site locations and d50 measurements.
This file contains estimates of d50 for sampling sites based on YOLO, NEXSS and Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022) modeling approaches.
This file contains latitude and longitude information for each of the study sites.
This file contains estimates of d50 for sampling sites based on NEXSS and Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022) modeling approaches.
This file contains information about sampling sites.
This file contains information about d50 values extracted from a digitized version of Figure 2 in  Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
This file contains information about images used for YOLO d50 estimates; and YOLO model diagnostics.
This file contains outputs from the YOLO-enabled d50 estimation approach.
This file contains information about sampling sites.
This file contains information about site characteristics used for correlation analyses.

HUC4 National Hydrography Dataset watershed boundary shapefile. The shape file consists of multiple file extensions. The file ending in ".shp" stores the spatial geometry of the features. The file ending in ".shx" indexes the geometry. The file ending in ".dbf" contains the tabular attribute information. The file ending in ".prj" defines the spatial reference system.
